05 Nov 2019, 13:39

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月05日訊】10大抗老好物一定要知道。

05 Nov 2019, 13:39

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 05, 2019] 10 major anti-aging good things must know.
10. Almond 9. Avocado 8. Berry fruit 7. Green tea 6. Soybean 5. Soba noodles 4. Garlic, ginger 3. Korean cabbage 2. Pumpkin, carrot 1. Banana
